languages.text: Лорд-капитан повелел{mf||а} атаковать молниеносно. Нас встретило зарево зенитного огня. Те, кому не повезло, погибли сразу. Другим предстояло болтаться в воздухе, молясь, чтобы следующий снаряд прошел мимо их шаттла. Но потери были оправданы — внезапной атакой мы захватили инициативу в той битве.

traits.locale_text: Нас встретило зарево тяжелого зенитного огня. Те, кому повезло, погибли сразу. Другим предстояло беспомощно болтать конечностями в воздухе, вопя от осознания, что им падать еще полтора километра до того как их расшибет в лепешку. Но Лорд-капитан приказал{mf||а} не щадить себя, так что ни одна сволочь не посмела отступить.

languages.text: The Lord Captain's orders were to commence a lightning-fast assault. We were flying straight into a hail of artillery fire. For many of us, that was the end. The rest were being thrown around in mid-air, praying that the next shell would miss their shuttle. But the losses were justified — with that surprise attack, we seized the initiative at the start of the battle.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан повелел{mf||а} атаковать молниеносно. Нас встретило зарево зенитного огня. Те, кому не повезло, погибли сразу. Другим предстояло болтаться в воздухе, молясь, чтобы следующий снаряд прошел мимо их шаттла. Но потери были оправданы — внезапной атакой мы захватили инициативу в той битве.

But the losses were justified — with that surprise attack, we seized the initiative at the start of the battle.

But the losses were justified — with that surprise attack, we seized the initiative at the start of the battle.

languages.text: 舰长大人下令采取闪电战，立刻对敌人发起突袭。我们在狂风暴雨般的炮火中朝敌人冲了过去。不少穿梭机被敌人的炮弹击中，穿梭机中的士兵当场阵亡。剩下的穿梭机则在半空中被掀得摇摇晃晃，士兵们祈祷接下来的炮火不要命中他们的穿梭机。不过，这样的损失并没有白费，这次突然袭击让我们在战斗刚刚打响时就掌握了主动权。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's orders were to commence a lightning-fast assault. We were flying straight into a hail of artillery fire. For many of us, that was the end. The rest were being thrown around in mid-air, praying that the next shell would miss their shuttle. But the losses were justified — with that surprise attack, we seized the initiative at the start of the battle.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人下令采取闪电战，立刻对敌人发起突袭。我们在狂风暴雨般的炮火中朝敌人冲了过去。不少穿梭机被敌人的炮弹击中，穿梭机中的士兵当场阵亡。剩下的穿梭机则在半空中被掀得摇摇晃晃，士兵们祈祷接下来的炮火不要命中他们的穿梭机。不过，这样的损失并没有白费，这次突然袭击让我们在战斗刚刚打响时就掌握了主动权。

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} ayant donné l'ordre de lancer une attaque-éclair, nous avons donc volé droit dans une tempête de tirs d'artillerie qui s'est avérée fatale pour nombre d'entre nous. Les survivants étaient ballottés dans les airs et priaient pour que le prochain obus veuille bien éviter leur navette. Mais les pertes étaient justifiées : avec cet assaut surprise, nous avons pris l'initiative du début de la bataille.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's orders were to commence a lightning-fast assault. We were flying straight into a hail of artillery fire. For many of us, that was the end. The rest were being thrown around in mid-air, praying that the next shell would miss their shuttle. But the losses were justified — with that surprise attack, we seized the initiative at the start of the battle.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} ayant donné l'ordre de lancer une attaque-éclair, nous avons donc volé droit dans une tempête de tirs d'artillerie qui s'est avérée fatale pour nombre d'entre nous. Les survivants étaient ballottés dans les airs et priaient pour que le prochain obus veuille bien éviter leur navette. Mais les pertes étaient justifiées : avec cet assaut surprise, nous avons pris l'initiative du début de la bataille.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの命令は電光石火の突撃を開始することだった。我々は砲撃の雨の中を直進した。多くの者はそこで終わりを迎えた。残りの者たちは空中で投げ飛ばされ、次の砲弾が自分たちのシャトルを外すことを祈った。しかし、我々の損失の見返りは大きかった――あの奇襲攻撃で、我々は戦闘開始時の主導権を握れたのだ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's orders were to commence a lightning-fast assault. We were flying straight into a hail of artillery fire. For many of us, that was the end. The rest were being thrown around in mid-air, praying that the next shell would miss their shuttle. But the losses were justified — with that surprise attack, we seized the initiative at the start of the battle.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの命令は電光石火の突撃を開始することだった。我々は砲撃の雨の中を直進した。多くの者はそこで終わりを迎えた。残りの者たちは空中で投げ飛ばされ、次の砲弾が自分たちのシャトルを外すことを祈った。しかし、我々の損失の見返りは大きかった――あの奇襲攻撃で、我々は戦闘開始時の主導権を握れたのだ。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ordenó un asalto relámpago. Nos lanzamos de cabeza contra una tormenta de artillería. Para muchos de nosotros, fue el fin, mientras que el resto nos vimos zarandeados mientras rezábamos para que la siguiente andanada no alcanzara nuestra lanzadera. Sin embargo, las bajas estaban justificadas: el ataque sorpresa nos dio la iniciativa al comenzar la batalla.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's orders were to commence a lightning-fast assault. We were flying straight into a hail of artillery fire. For many of us, that was the end. The rest were being thrown around in mid-air, praying that the next shell would miss their shuttle. But the losses were justified — with that surprise attack, we seized the initiative at the start of the battle.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ordenó un asalto relámpago. Nos lanzamos de cabeza contra una tormenta de artillería. Para muchos de nosotros, fue el fin, mientras que el resto nos vimos zarandeados mientras rezábamos para que la siguiente andanada no alcanzara nuestra lanzadera. Sin embargo, las bajas estaban justificadas: el ataque sorpresa nos dio la iniciativa al comenzar la batalla.

languages.text: Der Befehl des Lord Captains lautete, einen blitzschnellen Angriff durchzuführen. Wir flogen geradewegs in einen Hagel aus Artilleriefeuer. Für viele von uns war das das Ende. Die übrigen wurden in der Luft herumgewirbelt und beteten, dass das nächste Geschoss ihr Shuttle verfehlen würde. Doch die Verluste waren gerechtfertigt. Durch diesen Überraschungsangriff übernahmen wir zu Beginn der Schlacht die Initiative.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's orders were to commence a lightning-fast assault. We were flying straight into a hail of artillery fire. For many of us, that was the end. The rest were being thrown around in mid-air, praying that the next shell would miss their shuttle. But the losses were justified — with that surprise attack, we seized the initiative at the start of the battle.

Die übrigen wurden in der Luft herumgewirbelt und beteten, dass das nächste Geschoss ihr Shuttle verfehlen würde. Doch die Verluste waren gerechtfertigt. Durch diesen Überraschungsangriff übernahmen wir zu Beginn der Schlacht die Initiative.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, ışık hızında bir taarruz düzenlenmesini emretti. Doğrudan top atışlarının içine uçuyorduk. Çoğumuz ölümle tanışıyor, kalanlar ise sonraki topun mekiğine isabet etmemesi için dua ederek havada sağa sola savruluyordu. Ancak kayıplarımızın kanı boşa akmadı. Bu sürpriz saldırı sayesinde savaş başlar başlamaz inisiyatifi ele aldık.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's orders were to commence a lightning-fast assault. We were flying straight into a hail of artillery fire. For many of us, that was the end. The rest were being thrown around in mid-air, praying that the next shell would miss their shuttle. But the losses were justified — with that surprise attack, we seized the initiative at the start of the battle.
